Because of these differences, physicians and researchers now usually consider FOXG1 syndrome to be distinct from Rett syndrome.",GHR,FOXG1 syndrome
How many people are affected by FOXG1 syndrome ?,FOXG1 syndrome appears to be rare. At least 30 affected individuals have been described in the medical lite
